FuncDef: This command defines the maximum interval between two consecutive SPF calculations in milliseconds. Timers that determine when to initiate the first, second and subsequent SPF calculations after a topology change occurs can be controlled with this command.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum interval in milliseconds between two consecutive SPF calculations. Values-10 to 120000. ParamDefault: Default- 10000
Specifies the initial SPF calculation delay in milliseconds after a topology change. Values-10 to 100000. ParamDefault: Default- 1000
Specifies the hold time in milliseconds between the first and second SPF calculation. Values-10 to 100000. ParamDefault: Default- 1000

msg: Error CLI:[ no ] spf-wait <spf-wait> [ spf-initial-wait <initial-wait> ] [ spf-second-wait <second-wait> ]]
